Summary: There were two lights one on top of the other about a mile or so apart.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Cleveland
There were no other sightings in Cleveland on or around November 28th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsThe top light was smaller than the bottom light, the bottom light was bigger and brighter. They were there for about an hour and then they just shot off and I could no longer see them. I noticed them because they were so bright, at first I thought they were lights from a tower but I realized there is no tower in the area I saw the lights and they weren't blinking and there was no red light at the top for aircraft, so I continued to watch the lights until they took off. It was very exciting when I realized that I had just seen something I couldn't explain. My cousin and mother both saw the ligths.
